title: Map's inputs configuration
description: The Configuration of the map's inputs

displayLayerSwitcher.description: Whether the layer switcher controll is displayed. If not, the map component uses the default style group and with its default style.

maxWidthScale.description: Max width of the scale in px. Default value is 100px.

unitScale.description: Unit of the scale. Default value is 'metric'.

onHover.description: List of layers ids to listen to on hover

emitOnClick.description: List of layers ids to listen to on click event in order to emit features

zoomOnClick.description: List of layers ids to listen to on click event in order to trigger zoom action

mapSources.description: List of mapboxgl sources to add to the map

type.description: Type of the source. Possible values : 'vector' | 'raster' | 'geojson' | 'image' | 'video' | 'canvas'

minzoom.description: Minimum zoom to display the source layers

maxzoom.description: Maximum zoom to display the source layers

coordinates.description: The 4 corners coordinates of the canvas/image/video, given as [longitude, latitude].

data.description: A geojson object or a url to a geojson file (for `geosjson` type).

canvas.description: Id of the canvas element (for `canvas` type)

animate.description: Whether the canvas source is animated (for `canvas` type)

defaultBasemapStyle.description: Defines the name and default basemap style.

styleFile.description: url to basemap style or a `mapboxgl.Style`

items.description: Defines the name and the basemap style.

styleFile.description: url to basemap style or a `mapboxgl.Style`

initCenter.description: Coordinates of the map's centre when it's initialized.

initZoom.description: Zoom of the map when it's initialized

margePanForLoad.description: Margin applied to the map extent. Data is loaded in all this extent

margePanForTest.description: Margin applied to the map extent. Before loading data, the components checks first if there are features already loaded in this extent.

drawButtonEnabled.description: Whether the draw tools are activated.

drawPolygonVerticesLimit.description: Maximum number of vertices allowed when drawing a polygon.

items.description: A Visualisation set is an entity where to group layers together

layers.description: List of layers ids grouped in this visualisation set

enabled.description: If enabled, all the layers can be displayed on the map, otherwise the layers are removed from the map.

icons.description: List of icons to add to the map and to use in layers styling.

path.description: path to the icon. The icon should be placed at `assest/icons` folder and should be `png` or `jpeg`. Example : 'path': 'arlas_direction_arrow.png'

recolorable.description: Whether to allow recolorising the icon or not.
